# EchoAI - AI Brand Visibility Intelligence Platform

> EchoAI measures and improves how brands appear in AI assistant recommendations across ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and Perplexity.

## What is EchoAI?

EchoAI is an AI visibility intelligence platform that helps brands understand, measure, and optimize how they are represented in AI-powered search and assistant responses. Unlike traditional SEO tools, EchoAI focuses specifically on how Large Language Models (LLMs) perceive and recommend brands.

## Core Features

### EchoScore
A 0-100 score measuring your brand's visibility across AI platforms. Higher scores mean AI assistants mention and recommend your brand more frequently.

### Multi-Platform Tracking
- ChatGPT and GPT-4
- Google Gemini
- Anthropic Claude
- Perplexity AI
- Microsoft Copilot

### Competitive Analysis
See how your brand ranks against competitors in AI recommendations. Understand why competitors appear more frequently and what actions to take.

### Action Layer (Unique Differentiator)
Unlike monitoring-only tools, EchoAI provides:
- Prioritized recommendations to improve visibility
- Predicted ROI for each action
- Before/after tracking to prove what works

## Who Uses EchoAI?

- CMOs and Marketing Leaders - Track brand perception in AI channels
- Brand Managers - Monitor competitive positioning
- SEO/Content Teams - Optimize content for AI discovery
- Agencies - Provide AI visibility services to clients
